original: %1$s bites and rends %2$s
%1$s bites and tears into %2$s
%1$s chomps %2$s
%1$s scratches and slashes at %2$s with the claws on their feet
translation: 在%2$s点，%1$s人用脚爪抓伤和划伤

original: %1$s snaps at %2$s
%1$s stabs %2$s with their tail
%1$s stabs at %2$s with the insectoid stinger
%1$s stabs at %2$s with the stinger inside their petals
%1$s strongly swings at %2$s with its mighty tail
A deep green moss has grown a patchy covering over parts of your body providing some protection from the cold.
translation: 一种深绿色的苔藓在你身体的某些部位长出了一层斑驳的覆盖物，为你抵御寒冷提供了一些保护。

original: A pair of leather gloves with no fingers, allowing greater manual dexterity.
translation: 一副没有手指的皮手套，使手更灵活。

original: A pair of leather gloves with no fingers, allowing greater manual dexterity.  These have been crudely reinforced with steel guards across the back.
translation: 一副没有手指的皮手套，使手更灵活。这些已经被粗糙地加固了钢护板横跨背部。

original: A set of beautiful colored shiny feathers has grown to cover some parts of your body, acting as natural armor. And making your appereance more majestic than before, with a collar of feathers around your neck, that looks like a crown-like set of feathers you sure, have become a presence to behold. Somewhat reduces wet effects and protects slightly agaisnt cold.
translation: 一套美丽的彩色闪亮的羽毛已经长到覆盖你身体的某些部位，充当天然的盔甲。使你的容貌比从前更为威严，颈项上套着一圈羽毛，好像冠冕，好像一套羽毛，这是你必看见的。一定程度上减少潮湿的影响，并保护轻微的不感冒。

original: A set of flexible iridescent scales has grown to cover your body, acting as natural armor.  Somewhat reduces wet effects.
translation: 一套灵活的彩虹鳞片已经长到覆盖你的身体，充当天然的盔甲。一定程度上减少了潮湿的影响。

original: A set of heavy, stiff, and thick scales has grown to cover your body, acting as natural armor.  While very protective, it also severely limits your flexibility, resulting in a -3 penalty to Dexterity.  Greatly reduces wet effects.
translation: 一套沉重、坚硬、厚实的鳞片覆盖了你的身体，充当了天然的盔甲。虽然保护性很强，但它也严重限制了你的灵活性，导致灵巧度受到-3的惩罚。大大减少潮湿影响。

original: A set of sub-dermal bony scutes has grown all over your body, giving you something similar to an insect's exoskeleton. they give your scales a rough and pebbly texture and are nigh impossible to penetrate. reduces wet effects.
translation: 一组皮下骨盾长在你的全身，给你类似昆虫外骨骼的东西。他们给你的鳞片粗糙的纹理，几乎不可能穿透。减少潮湿影响。

original: Animal Skin
Aquatic Adaptation
Arachnid Anatomy
Arachnid Eyes
Avian Physique
Avian Skin
Bear Feet
Beastly Anatomy
Beastly Muzzle
Became tortoisey enough for the tortoise club.
translation: 变成了乌龟俱乐部的乌龟。

original: Best Practices for Compound Delivery
translation: 化合物交付的最佳实践

original: Blossomed
Bony Scutes
Bovine Anatomy
Bovine Eyes
Bovine Tongue
Challenge - Lab Mutant
Changes, rebalances and adds some more mutations. This a fixed version for the fixed version to cleanse the mod of even more old bugs and problems. It has some new mutations and additions as well.
translation: 改变，重新平衡，增加更多的突变。这是一个固定版本的固定版本，用于清除mod中更多的旧bug和问题。它也有一些新的突变和补充。

original: Chimera
Chimerical Anatomy
Chimerical Legs
Chimerical Muzzle
Chimerical Protection
Every animal that ever lived... bursting! From! YOU!
translation: 曾经生活过的每一种动物。。。爆破！来自！你！

original: Everything slows down for just a moment.
Experiment
Feline Anatomy
Fin Ears
Finally! That weird skin has now developed a cohesive fur-scale skin that was before unseen in the animal kingdom. This provides considerable protection and warmth. Moderately reduces wet effects.
translation: 终于！这种奇怪的皮肤现在已经形成了一种在动物界以前从未见过的黏性毛皮鳞片皮肤。这提供了相当大的保护和温暖。适度减少潮湿影响。

original: Fish Anatomy
Fishy Eyes
Flora
Fluffy Basher
Forest
Heavy fingerless leather gloves.  Very flexible and comfortable.
translation: 沉重的无指皮手套。非常灵活舒适。

original: In your dream, you catch a distinctively tortoise-like image of yourself.
translation: 在你的梦里，你捕捉到了一个独特的乌龟般的自我形象。

original: Inconspicuous
Insectile Anatomy
Locked Lab Mutant
Lupine Anatomy
Mossy
Mutated Raptor Tail
Mutation Changes
No Ears
No Nose
Now that you have your shell you can take your time with this survival business.
translation: 既然你有了自己的外壳，你就可以慢慢来做这个生存生意了。

original: Now the cataclysm is here it's better to be quick than slow.  Dexterity + 3
translation: 现在灾难来了，快总比慢好。灵巧+3

original: PE023 "Medical": Application and Findings
PE050 "Alpha": Preliminary Report
PE065 "Chimera": Best Practices
PE070 "Raptor": Proposal
Raptor Anatomy
Raptor Feathers
Raptor Muzzle
Raptor Scales
Ratty Finesse
Ratty Smarts
Razor Teeth
Reptilian Anatomy
Rodentine Anatomy
Rough Fur
Since birth, your sole purpose in life has been the advancement of genetic science, willingly or not.  Once the cataclysm struck, you left the lab, and wandered aimlessly, ending up in a forest.
translation: 从出生起，你生命中唯一的目标就是基因科学的进步，不管你愿不愿意。灾难发生后，你离开了实验室，漫无目的地游荡，最后在一片森林里。

original: Slit Nostrils
Snake Skin
Snapping Muzzle
Stinger
The on your body fur has taken on a rough texture. It provides marginal protection against attacks, and considerable protection from cold.
translation: 你身上的毛质地粗糙。它对攻击提供边缘保护，对寒冷提供相当大的保护。

original: The structure of your body and your internal physiology has more in common with flora than it does fauna. Why bother with things like 'scavenging' and 'hunting' when there is good soil to plant yourself in?.
translation: 你的身体结构和你的内在生理学与植物比动物有更多的共同点。既然有好的土壤可以种植，为什么还要费心去做“拾荒”和“打猎”之类的事情呢？。

original: Thick Fur
Toe Roots
Tortoise
Tortoise Anatomy
Tortoise Eyes
Tortoise Scales
Tortoise Tail
Tortoise Tongue
United disunity.
Ursine Anatomy
Ursine Tongue
Webbed Extremities
While sleeping or staying still, it is less likely that monsters will wander close to you.
translation: 睡觉或静止时，怪物不太可能靠近你。

original: You are comforted by a dream of you being protected by your strong shell as predators try in vain to eat you.
translation: 当捕食者徒劳地试图吃掉你时，你会被你强壮的外壳所保护的梦想所安慰。

original: You bet that you could solve any maze or problem faster than those other 'survivors'.  Intelligence + 3
translation: 你敢打赌你能比其他“幸存者”更快地解决任何迷宫或问题。智力+3

original: You bite and rend %s
You bite and tear into %s
You carry your rugged body with the dignity you deserve.  Strength +4.
translation: 你以应有的尊严扛着你粗犷的身躯。臂力+4。

original: You chomp %s
You don't have time for lollygagging when there's survival at stake. Who cares that you're not even human anymore when the other survivors out there can't even compete with you?
translation: 当生存危在旦夕时，你没有时间闲聊。当其他幸存者甚至无法与你竞争时，谁会在乎你不再是人类了？

original: You feel like everything is happening too quickly.
translation: 你觉得一切都发生得太快了。

original: You feel safe knowing that no matter how fast everything else may be, your shell will protect you.
translation: 你会感到安全，因为你知道无论其他事情有多快，你的外壳都会保护你。

original: You find it hard to wake from your peaceful dream of basking in the sun.
translation: 你发现很难从晒太阳的宁静梦中醒来。

original: You grown a short, thin tail. It looks cute and quite tortoisey, but it otherwise serves no purpose.
translation: 你长了一条又短又细的尾巴。它看起来很可爱，很像乌龟，但在其他方面却毫无用处。

original: You have a bulbous bee-like abdomen tipped with a smooth stinger that bobs behind you.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows for a powerful piercing attack.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants.
translation: 你有一个球状的蜜蜂般的腹部，顶端有一根光滑的刺，在你身后晃动。它一点也不能提高你的平衡，但是允许一个强大的穿刺攻击。防止穿非织物裤子。

original: You have a flattened nose and thin slits for nostrils, giving you a fish-like appearance.  This makes breathing slightly difficult and increases mouth encumbrance by 5.
translation: 你有一个扁平的鼻子和细长的鼻孔，让你看起来像鱼一样。这使得呼吸稍微困难，并增加5%的口腔负担。

original: You have a flattened nose and thin slits for nostrils, giving you a tortoise-like appearance.  This makes breathing slightly difficult and increases mouth encumbrance by 5.
translation: 你有一个扁平的鼻子和细的鼻孔，让你看起来像乌龟。这使得呼吸稍微困难，并增加5%的口腔负担。

original: You have a long life ahead of you. Time to take it slow.
translation: 你还有很长的路要走。是时候慢慢来了。

original: You have a sleek, aquadynamic tail like that of a shark or dolphin. It allows you to swim more quickly, but prevents wearing non-fabric pants.  Slightly increases wet benefits.
translation: 你有一条像鲨鱼或海豚一样光滑、充满活力的尾巴。它可以让你游得更快，但不能穿非织物裤子。略微增加湿益。

original: You have a strange dream of retreating into a shell and staying there.
translation: 你做了一个奇怪的梦，想躲进一个贝壳里，呆在那里。

original: You have an odd dream about tortoises.
translation: 你做了一个关于乌龟的奇怪的梦。

original: You have grown 4 additional eyes and all of your eyes have become solid pitch black. This increases your perception by 2 and makes you look more spider-like.
translation: 你又长了4只眼睛，所有的眼睛都变成了漆黑一片。这会让你的感知增加2，让你看起来更像蜘蛛。

original: You have grown a spider abdomen that produces and anchors webbing.  Too bad you can't seem to control the process.  There is a chance that you will leave webs in your wake. Prevents wearing non-fabric pants
translation: 你已经长出了一个蜘蛛的腹部，产生并锚定织带。可惜你似乎无法控制这个过程。有一个机会，你会离开你的网站。防止穿非织物裤子

original: You have grown even more massive, to the point where you cannot usefully fit into human-sized clothing or vehicles.  Much of it is powerful muscle mass (Strength +6), but it's a real pain to haul around.
translation: 你已经变得更加庞大，以至于你无法有效地适应人类大小的衣服或车辆。大部分都是强大的肌肉（力量+6），但拖来拖去确实很痛苦。

original: You have grown multiple rows of razor sharp teeth. They allow you to make a super powerful bite attack, but they have caused your mouth and jaw to widen significantly making you look like a shark or angler-fish
translation: 你长出了多排锋利的牙齿。它们可以让你进行超级强力的撕咬攻击，但是它们会让你的嘴和下巴明显变宽，让你看起来像鲨鱼或琵琶鱼

original: You have grown noticeably taller and broader.  Much of it is useful muscle mass (Strength +3), but you find it throws off your balance and you get in your own way (+10 torso and arm encumbrance).
translation: 你明显长得更高更宽了。大部分是有用的肌肉质量（力量+3），但你发现它会失去你的平衡，你得到你自己的方式（+10躯干和手臂负担）。

original: You need to roar, bask, bite, and flap.  NOW!.
translation: 你需要吼叫、晒太阳、咬东西和拍打。现在！。

original: You scratch and slash at %s with the claws on your feet
translation: 你用脚上的爪子在%s划伤和砍伤

original: You snap at %s
You stab %s with your tail
You stab at %s with the stinger inside your petals
You stab at %s with your insectoid stinger
translation: 你用你的昆虫毒刺刺向%s

original: You strongly swing at %s with your mighty tail
translation: 你用你有力的尾巴在%s大力摆动

original: You survived the processes, whatever they were doing to you, you are awake now. You have been locked in a lab with no (obvious) way out!  Find a way to escape or starve to death.
translation: 你挺过来了，不管他们对你做了什么，你现在都醒了。你被锁在一个没有（明显）出路的实验室里！想办法逃跑或饿死。

original: You've grown a thick pelt of rough black fur, providing protection from cold and attacks.
translation: 你长了一层厚厚的粗糙的黑色皮毛，可以抵御寒冷和攻击。

original: Your body structure and physiology has become an amalgamation of multiple different animals. You feel unstoppable, but you now no longer even look vaguely human. Any potential meal looking at you would have no doubt that you are some sort of chimerical monster.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理已经成为多种不同动物的融合体。你觉得自己势不可挡，但你现在甚至不再是一个模模糊糊的人。任何潜在的食物看着你都会毫不怀疑你是某种奇形怪状的怪物。

original: Your body structure and physiology has become similar to that of a velociraptor. You feel a little stronger and faster, but you look rather inhuman because of it.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理学已经变得和一只迅猛龙相似了。你觉得自己强壮了一点，速度也快了一点，但你却因此显得很不人道。

original: Your body structure and physiology has become similar to that of some aquatic animal. You feel faster than before, but you look very inhuman because of it. All you want to do is get back into the water.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理学已经和一些水生动物相似了。你感觉比以前快了，但你因此看起来很不人道。你只想回到水里。

original: Your body structure and physiology has become that of some super predatory beast. You have never felt better, but there would be little doubt in anyone's mind that you are anything but human.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理已经变成了某种超级食肉动物。你从来没有感觉好过，但在任何人的心目中，你绝对不是人。

original: Your body structure and physiology has more in common with arachnids than of humans. Your arachnid abdomen now safely houses your vital organs. You wonder what will wander into your web today.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理学与蛛形纲动物比人类更为相似。你的蛛网膜腹部现在安全地容纳了你的重要器官。你想知道今天会有什么东西出现在你的网上。

original: Your body structure and physiology has more in common with canines than it does humans. You feel like a fearless predator, but you bet people would mistake you for a werewolf.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理学与犬科动物比与人类有更多的共同点。你觉得自己是个无所畏惧的掠夺者，但你敢打赌人们会把你当成狼人。

original: Your body structure and physiology has more in common with crocodilians than of humans. Your muscles bulge with power, but no one would mistake you for human. Maybe you should find a nice sunny spot to bask in.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理学与鳄鱼比人类更为相似。你的肌肉因力量而膨胀，但没人会误以为你是人类。也许你应该找个阳光明媚的地方晒太阳。

original: Your body structure and physiology has more in common with felines than it does humans. You feel as nimble as a cat, but no one would mistake you for human anymore.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理学与猫科动物比人类更为相似。你觉得自己像猫一样敏捷，但没人会再把你当成人类了。

original: Your body structure and physiology has more in common with insects than of humans. Your insectile abdomen now safely houses your vital organs, but you doubt that you will be making any human friends soon.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理学与昆虫比与人类更为相似。你不安全的腹部现在安全地容纳你的重要器官，但你怀疑你会很快交到任何人类朋友。

original: Your body structure and physiology has taken on a rather bovine quality. You feel a little stronger, but you look rather inhuman because of it.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理学已经呈现出相当牛的特质。你觉得自己强壮了一点，但你因此看起来很不人道。

original: Your body structure and physiology has taken on a rather tortoisey quality. You feel a little stronger and safer, but you look rather inhuman because of it.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理学已经呈现出相当乌龟的特质。你觉得自己更强壮、更安全，但你却因此显得不人道。

original: Your body structure and physiology has taken on a rather ursine quality. You feel a little stronger, but you look rather inhuman because of it.
translation: 你的身体结构和生理学已经呈现出相当的熊的特质。你觉得自己强壮了一点，但你因此看起来很不人道。

original: Your body's physiology has completely adapted to life underwater. This doesn't change your appearance much, but you seem to always have a fishy sheen to your body.  Greatly increases wet benefits.
translation: 你的身体已经完全适应了水下生活。这不会改变你的外表，但你的身体似乎总是有一种腥味。大大增加了湿的好处。

original: Your cardiovascular system has caught up with your muscular physique, so who needs pathetic human cars? Strength +8.
translation: 你的心血管系统已经赶上了你的肌肉体质，那么谁需要可怜的人类汽车呢？臂力+8。

original: Your dreams give you a strange protected feeling.
translation: 你的梦给你一种奇怪的感觉。

original: Your ears have changed into fin-like appendages. This does not effect your hearing in any way but it does look striking. Slightly reduces wet effects
translation: 你的耳朵变成了鳍状的附属物。这对你的听力没有任何影响，但看起来确实很惊人。轻微减少潮湿效果

original: Your entire head has become a flower with a deadly stinger in its center much like like those triffids that you saw earlier. You can still eat, breathe, and see just fine, but you cannot wear anything on or around your head.
translation: 你的整个脑袋都变成了一朵花，中间有一根致命的毒刺，就像你之前看到的那些三叉戟一样。你仍然可以吃，呼吸，看的很好，但你不能戴任何东西在你的头上或周围。

original: Your entire nose has disappeared leaving nothing behind. This does not seem to effect your sense of smell at all as you have developed other organs for smell, but it does make you look rather inhuman.
translation: 你的整个鼻子都消失了，什么也没留下。这似乎根本不影响你的嗅觉，因为你已经发展出其他嗅觉器官，但它确实让你看起来相当不人道。

original: Your eyes are now a solid black with no visible iris and barely noticeable sclera. They give you a vaguely fish-like look but they otherwise serve no purpose.
translation: 你的眼睛现在是纯黑的，没有可见的虹膜和几乎看不见的巩膜。他们给你一个模糊的鱼一样的外观，但他们没有其他用途。

original: Your eyes have mutated to resemble those found on a tortoise. This is visually striking, but doesn't seem to affect your vision.
translation: 你的眼睛已经变异成类似乌龟的眼睛。这在视觉上很醒目，但似乎不影响你的视力。

original: Your eyes have mutated, now having a long and narrow horizontal pupil much like those of a bovine.  This is visually striking, but it doesn't seem to effect your vision at all.
translation: 你的眼睛变了，现在有一个又长又窄的水平瞳孔，很像牛的眼睛。这在视觉上是惊人的，但它似乎一点也不影响你的视力。

original: Your face and jaws have extended outwards causing you to resemble an extinct dinosaur. It's filled with razor sharp teeth that leave nasty wounds, but it prevents you from wearing mouthgear.
translation: 你的脸和下巴向外伸展，使你看起来像一只灭绝的恐龙。它充满了锋利的牙齿，留下严重的伤口，但它阻止你戴口器。

original: Your face and jaws have extended outwards into some sort of bizarre muzzle that blends features from various animals. You could not even begin to guess what it could belong to, but you do know that it has one powerful bite.
translation: 你的脸和下巴向外延伸成某种奇怪的口吻，融合了各种动物的特征。你甚至猜不出它可能属于什么，但你知道它有一个强大的咬。

original: Your face and jaws have morphed to look like those found on a snapping turtle. It gives you a turtle-like look and they deliver a painful bite, but prevent you from wearing mouthgear not made of fabric.
translation: 你的脸和下巴已经变形，看起来像在鳄龟身上发现的一样。它让你看起来像乌龟一样，它们会咬你一口，但会阻止你戴上非织物制成的牙套。

original: Your feet have taken on a distinctly ursine quality to them.  This has no effect.
translation: 你的脚有一种明显的熊的特质。这没有效果。

original: Your fluffy tail has now become pretty long and very strong... Possibly even stronger than a baseball bat when its tensed, allowing for a mighty swing attack. Great! you won't be needing a baseball bat anymore if you want to play baseball and the funny part is that all the hits will be homerun! It also has become a bit more controllable and prehensile.
translation: 你毛茸茸的尾巴现在变得又长又壮...可能比棒球棍绷紧时更强，允许有力的挥击。太棒了！如果你想打棒球，你就不再需要棒球棒了，有趣的是所有的安打都是全垒打！它也变得更加可控和易于理解。

original: Your hands and feet are strongly webbed allowing you to swim much faster. Unfortunately, gloves now give you problems and your dexterity is decreased by 1. Slightly decreases wet penalties.
translation: 你的手和脚有很强的蹼，让你游得更快。不幸的是，手套现在给你带来了问题，你的灵巧度降低了1。略微减少湿处罚。

original: Your jaw and nose have extended into some kind of monstrous muzzle. It delivers a strong bite and looks absolutely beastly, but prevents you from wearing mouthgear.
translation: 你的下巴和鼻子伸进了某种可怕的枪口。它提供了一个强大的咬，看起来绝对野兽，但防止你戴口器。

original: Your legs have mutated in such a manner that your body managed to develop fearsome but impressive and very powerful and sharp hoof-claws, something that was never seen before in the animal kingdom. They allow you to make some powerful kicking attacks, but they prevent you from wearing any footgear
translation: 你的双腿已经以这样一种方式发生变异，以至于你的身体成功地发展出可怕但令人印象深刻的、非常强大和锋利的蹄爪，这在动物王国中是从未见过的。他们允许你做一些强有力的踢腿攻击，但他们阻止你穿任何装备

original: Your long semi-stiff lizard-like tail has mutated and now its slightly longer and ends in a viciously sharp and boney point.  It does not improve your balance at all, but allows you to lash with it and cause significant piercing damage.  Prevents wearing non-fabric pants. Now that is a heavy genetic modification.
translation: 你那长的半僵硬的蜥蜴般的尾巴已经变异了，现在变得稍微长了一点，并以一个非常尖锐和骨感的点结束。它一点也不能提高你的平衡能力，但是可以让你用它来鞭笞，造成严重的穿刺伤害。防止穿非织物裤子。这是一次重大的基因改造。

original: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like a bird. This does not effect your hearing in any way.
translation: 你的外耳器官消失了，没有外耳，让你看起来有点像鸟。这对你的听力没有任何影响。

original: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like a lizard. This does not effect your hearing in any way.
translation: 你的外耳器官消失了，没有外耳，让你看起来有点像蜥蜴。这对你的听力没有任何影响。

original: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like a raptor. This does not effect your hearing in any way.
translation: 你的外耳器官消失了，没有外耳，让你看起来有点像猛禽。这对你的听力没有任何影响。

original: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like a spider. This does not effect your hearing in any way.
translation: 你的外耳器官消失了，没有外耳，看起来有点像蜘蛛。这对你的听力没有任何影响。

original: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like a tortoise. This does not effect your hearing in any way.
translation: 你的外耳器官消失了，没有外耳，让你看起来有点像乌龟。这对你的听力没有任何影响。

original: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like some sort of cephalopod. This does not effect your hearing in any way.
translation: 你的外耳器官消失了，没有外耳，看起来有点像头足类动物。这对你的听力没有任何影响。

original: Your outer aural organs have disappeared leaving you without external ears making you look a bit like some sort of insect. This does not effect your hearing in any way.
translation: 你的外耳器官消失了，没有外耳，让你看起来有点像某种昆虫。这对你的听力没有任何影响。

original: Your physiology now has more in common with birds than it does humans. The scales on your arms and legs provide some protection and the talons on your feet leave a nasty scratch, but your changed feet prevents you from wearing footgear. +2 dex
translation: 你的生理学现在与鸟类比人类有更多的共同点。你胳膊和腿上的鳞片提供了一些保护，你脚上的爪子留下了一个可怕的划痕，但你换了脚后，你就不能穿上鞋子了。+2指数

original: Your skin has mutated noticeably because it is more related to animals than humans. It grows more hair than a human skin and its a bit tougher, and doesn't seem to  protect you from cold... Beasty! But you are doing just fine. Also you won't have any problem related to skin.
translation: 你的皮肤发生了明显的变异，因为它与动物的关系比与人类的关系更密切。它比人的皮肤长出更多的毛发，而且有点硬，似乎不能保护你免受寒冷。。。有活力！但你做得很好。你也不会有任何皮肤问题。

original: Your skin has mutated noticeably because it is more related to birds than humans. At the beggining it looks normal but if you look closely, it looks like if you are having a classic 'chicken skin' symptom just that is a little more scaly, a bit pinkier, and it is a bit more delicate... Birdie! But you are doing just fine. Also you won't have any problem related to skin.
translation: 你的皮肤发生了明显的变异，因为它与鸟类的关系比与人类的关系更密切。在beggining，它看起来很正常，但如果你仔细观察，它看起来就像你有一个典型的'鸡皮'症状，只是有点鳞片，有点小手指，它是有点微妙。。。小鸟！但你做得很好。你也不会有任何皮肤问题。

original: Your skin has mutated noticeably because it is more related to reptiles than humans. It has a very scaly texture, its a bit shiny, a bit more hardy, and a little slippery. Or similar to that of snakes for short... Snakey! But you are doing just fine. Also you won't have any problem related to skin.
translation: 你的皮肤发生了明显的变异，因为它与爬行动物的关系比人类更密切。它有一个非常鳞片状的纹理，它有点亮，有点硬，有点滑。或类似于蛇的简称。。。斯内基！但你做得很好。你也不会有任何皮肤问题。

original: Your toes have grown wriggly, and you can't imagine why you wear that stuff on your feet.  Take it off.  It's in the way.
translation: 你的脚趾变得扭来扭去，你无法想象你为什么把那东西穿在脚上。脱下来。它挡道了。

original: Your tongue has become rounded and thicker, looking like that of a tortoise.  This has no effect.
translation: 你的舌头变得又圆又厚，像乌龟一样。这没有效果。

original: Your tongue has flattened and has become longer, looking like that of a bear.  This has no effect.
translation: 你的舌头变平变长了，看起来像只熊。这没有效果。

original: Your tongue has flattened and has become wider, looking like that of a bovine.  This has no effect.
translation: 你的舌头变平变宽了，像牛一样。这没有效果。
